nodes.bodyText: (nit) I prefer the previous style when checking a list of boolean conditions. Should I stop doing this?
I’m fine adding a suppress warning sign. I guess a consistant list is indeed nice
Seems more sensible for me to change my preference if nobody else feels strongly and it'll make linting easier
I just checked the whole method and I agree with you. So I just deleted the warning here.
I just checked the whole method and I agree with you. So I just deleted the warning here.
